participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Playful and energetic, with a love for adventure and excitement.
participant_1.background: I imagine myself fighting in the arena as Mileena. I have a cat named Jasper. I work at a doctor's office. I'm not always graceful, but my kids find it hilarious when I trip over my own feet. I like things that explode.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, with a passion for creativity and arts.
participant_2.background: I like to use websites that help me learn about music and color theory. I also eat too much french fries. I want to take my uniform off and relax. My longest relationship was with my wife, but she doesn't like me anymore. I am single, but I am happy and content with my life, because I have my writing to keep me busy.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing alright, just a bit tired.
Aww, I'm sorry to hear that. Do you want to talk about it?
Not really, but thanks for offering.
No problem. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read and write.
Oh, that's great! I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I'm really into historical fiction right now.
That's cool! I've been meaning to get into historical fiction. Do you have any recommendations?
Sure! I really enjoyed the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon.
Oh, I've heard good things about that series. I'll have to check it out.
Yeah, it's really good! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games and watch movies. I also like to go to the gym.
Oh, that's cool! I used to play video games a lot, but I don't have as much time for them anymore.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I used to play a lot more when I was younger.
So, what kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like to watch a variety of movies, but I'm a big fan of action movies and comedies.
Oh, I like action movies too! I'm not really a fan of comedies, though.
Well, we can definitely find something to watch together.
Sounds good
